title: Signature Methodologies and how to create them

summary.description: Florian did not let me off the hook with this one. His many flight hours manifested in the way he clarified subtle nuance and how he gave very palpable examples of real application.
summary.guest: Florian Heinrichs is a Performance Advisor to Consulting firms and a friend. I've followed his work for a couple of years and we've been chatting for a little over one year. There's a clear connection between how his work highlights the power of a Signature Methodology and my own belief that Workshops are a phenomenal tool for Consulting firms.

topics: What makes a Signature Methodology actually work in practice?
How do you know when you have found a repeatable approach worth packaging?
What are the most common failure modes when developing methodologies?
